English
Greg,an unsuccessful screenwriter and Rachel,a beautiful journalist research an
outbreak of mass hysteria in a small village. They start to uncover a secret
about ergot poisoning that has affected this village for years. But the cult
activity has been kept a secret by the locals and when Greg disappears, Rachel is
left alone to unravel the mystery and save their lives.
